snippet: At their Milan atelier, one of the last truly Old World interiors firms, Studio Peregalli, is making history — mining everything from the high Renaissance to the Victorian era — to create deeply poetic spaces that transcend the bounds of time.
lead_paragraph: At their Milan atelier, one of the last truly Old World interiors firms, Studio Peregalli, is making history — mining everything from the high Renaissance to the Victorian era — to create deeply poetic spaces that transcend the bounds of time.
